properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO,MEMBER_EMAIL,MEMBER_NICK ,MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ADDR, PROFILE_IMG, TO_CHAR( ENROLL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ENROLL_DT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
